tool_description: In this api we provide APIs like Paraphrasing, Text Summarizer, POS Tagger, Keywords Extractor, Translation, Sentiment Analysis, Headline Generator, Language Detection and further will added over the time...
name: NLP Services
title: NLP Services

api_list.name: Language Detection
api_list.description:
The Language Detection API is a tool that can automatically identify the language in which a given piece of text is written. It utilizes advanced language processing techniques to analyze the linguistic patterns, vocabulary, and syntax of the text to make an accurate determination of the language. This API is useful in various applications where knowing the language of the text is crucial, such as content localization, multilingual customer support, and data analysis. By providing a quick and reliable way to identify languages, the Language Detection API streamlines processes that require language-specific handling and enables effective communication across linguistic barriers.

Limitations:
* Text length cannot be more then 5000 characters long for a single payload.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nlp-services.p.rapidapi.com/api/NLP/LanguageDetection"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nlp-services.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Headline/Title Generator
api_list.description:
Crafting engaging and attention-grabbing headlines is an art. Our headline generator uses AI to create captivating headlines that effectively convey the essence of the content, attracting readers and increasing click-through rates.

Limitations:
* Text length cannot be more then 5000 characters long for a single payload.

api_list.name: Sentiment Analysis
api_list.description:
By analyzing the sentiment expressed in a piece of text, our API can determine whether the sentiment is positive, negative, or neutral. This is valuable for brand monitoring, customer feedback analysis, and understanding public opinion.

Limitations:
* Text length cannot be more then 1000 characters long for a single payload.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nlp-services.p.rapidapi.com/api/NLP/SentimentAnalysis"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nlp-services.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Translation
api_list.description:
Our translation feature supports seamless language translation, allowing users to translate text from one language to another. This is incredibly useful for reaching a global audience and breaking down language barriers.

Limitations:
* Text length cannot be more then 5000 characters long for a single payload.

Supported Languages:
1. Albanian
2. Amharic
3. Arabic

api_list.name: POS Tagger
api_list.description:
The POS Tagger identifies the grammatical parts of speech in a sentence, helping in language analysis, syntax parsing, and linguistic studies.

Limitations:
* Text length cannot be more then 250 characters long for a single payload.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nlp-services.p.rapidapi.com/api/NLP/POSTagger"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nlp-services.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Keywords Extractor
api_list.description:
Extracting keywords from text can be crucial for content categorization, search engine optimization (SEO), and topic analysis. Our API can automatically extract relevant keywords from text, making it easier to categorize and organize content.
Limitations:
* Text length cannot be more then 5000 characters long for a single payload.

api_list.name: Text Summarizer
api_list.description:
Our text summarization API can automatically condense lengthy articles, documents, or paragraphs into concise and coherent summaries. This is ideal for quickly grasping the main ideas of a piece of text without having to read the entire document.

Limitations:
* Text length cannot be more then 5000 characters long for a single payload.

Supported Languages:

api_list.name: Paraphrase
api_list.description:
Our advanced paraphrasing tool can take a piece of text and rephrase it while preserving its original meaning. This feature is invaluable for content creators, educators, and anyone looking to create unique variations of existing text.

Limitations:
* Text length cannot be more then 5000 characters long for a single payload.
